title: Planter Boxes
summaries: Planter Boxes are special gardening objects purchased from the Dryad for 1 SC each in which herb or flower seeds can be planted. If left empty, wild grass plants will randomly grow out of them, provided the box is placed on the surface or in Space. The plant in a Planter Box cannot be cut in the regular manner, e.g. via nearby swinging tools. Instead, it needs to be removed with a pickaxe or drill, or the Staff of Regrowth or Axe of Regrowth.
Planter Boxes are placed and act like platforms: They do not require support beneath them and they can be walked on, but pressing ▼ Down will let a player fall through them.

Although the various Planter Boxes have different seed names and appearances, the differences are purely cosmetic: Any herb seeds can grow in any Planter Box, and planting seeds in their respective Planter Boxes will not provide any extra benefit. Depending on the <linked>evil biome</linked> of the world, the Dryad will sell a <linked>Deathweed</linked> Planter Box showing either <linked>Corrupt grass</linked> or <linked>Crimson grass</linked>.
